content.body:
Next TG5 meeting will be held on **Wednesday 27th of August**.
We'll have a talk about _formalisation/mechanisation of the JavaScript regex semantics_.
Link to the agenda: https://github.com/tc39/tg5/blob/main/agendas/2025/2025-08-27.md
